code: const API_BASE=process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL||process.env.REACT_APP_API||'http://localhost:4000';export async function fetchBooks(){const res=await fetch("".concat(API_BASE,"/books"));if(!res.ok)throw new Error("Failed to fetch books: ".concat(res.status));return res.json();}export async function createBook(payload){const res=await fetch("".concat(API_BASE,"/books"),{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify(payload)});if(!res.ok)throw new Error("Failed to create book: ".concat(res.status));return res.json();}export async function updateBook(id,payload){const res=await fetch("".concat(API_BASE,"/books/").concat(id),{method:'PUT',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify(payload)});if(!res.ok)throw new Error("Failed to update book: ".concat(res.status));return res.json();}export async function deleteBook(id){const res=await fetch("".concat(API_BASE,"/books/").concat(id),{method:'DELETE'});if(!res.ok&&res.status!==204)throw new Error("Failed to delete book: ".concat(res.status));return true;}
